title: Charge a Flat Rate of 100 USD Plus Own 500 MM to Create Governance Proposals
body: The Million Governance system has been misused by proposal spammer 0x245b...186f known as Uponlymillion on Discord. Uponlymillion has spammed the same proposal with only a variation of wording regarding time lock staking and casino gambling. Due to the fact that this user spams the Million Gov platform with the same proposals, the governance platform is embarrassing to MM Holders and does not look good to the outsiders we are trying to appeal to. Therefore, I propose that we move forward with a flat 100 USD fee plus proof of 500 mm ownership in order to be able to make proposals. The 100 dollar fee will be paid via MM and the MM will go straight into the "Million War Chest."
author: 0x8BFF504a370B7809695Aa883FA61b7E8afaCa513
